content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mine at position(19.0, 74.0)
Consists of 
- Burner mining drill (position: 19.0, 74.0)

### Iron Plate Smelter at position(20.0, 77.0)
Consists of 
- Stone furnace (position: 20.0, 77.0)
- Burner inserter (position: 18.5, 77.5) that takes output from furnace
- Wooden chest (position: 18.5, 78.5) that stores output from inserter

### ERROR TIPS

* Errors when harvesting without being close enough to the resource
  - Make sure to move to the target entity before attempting to harvest.
* Errors when using undefined variables
  - Ensure that all variables are defined before using them.
* Errors when placing entities too far away
  - Move closer to the target position before attempting to place an entity.
* Errors when placing entities on occupied tiles
  - Ensure that the target position is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place an entity.
* Errors when connecting entities directly without using an inserter
  - Use an inserter to transfer items between entities instead of connecting them directly.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
